alert.note: Alert for Mesa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 23 at 12:52PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Colorado, including the following county, Mesa. * WHEN...Until 400 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1252 PM MDT, satellite estimates indicate heavy rain from thunderstorms in the advisory area. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gateway.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
